iot:item.schema:name: meta

iot:item.schema:name: model

iot:item.schema:description: the associated ostate band for a Thing
iot:item.schema:name: ostate

iot:item.schema:description: this is an actuator, it changes something
iot:item.schema:name: actuator

iot:item.schema:description: there is a value to read
iot:item.schema:name: read

iot:item.schema:description: this is a sensor, it detects changes in the environment
iot:item.schema:name: sensor

iot:item.schema:description: you can write a value
iot:item.schema:name: write

iot:item.schema:description: The @type for Attribute definitions. Attributes define how to manipulate Models/Things. Use iot:attribute to relate something to an iot:Attribute
iot:item.schema:name: Attribute

iot:item.schema:description: data object associated with Thing
iot:item.schema:name: Band

iot:item.schema:description: the functional purpose of a thing
iot:item.schema:name: Facet

iot:item.schema:description: what the data looks like
iot:item.schema:name: Format

iot:item.schema:description: the @type for Models definitions. Models are the
iot:item.schema:name: Model

iot:item.schema:description: The @type for Place definitions. Places define a structured bundle of place related information. Use iot:place to relate something (typically a Thing) to an iot:Place
iot:item.schema:name: Place

iot:item.schema:description: defines the semantic purpose of this attribute
iot:item.schema:name: Purpose

iot:item.iot:help: this is likely to be deleted
iot:item.schema:name: Role

iot:item.schema:description: the @type for Thing definitions. A Thing is a specific instance of a Model.
iot:item.schema:name: Thing

iot:item.schema:description: the JSON type of values
iot:item.schema:name: Type

iot:item.schema:description: the Unit of measure the value uses
iot:item.schema:name: Unit

iot:item.schema:description: what is being measured
iot:item.schema:name: What

iot:item.iot:help: typically values greater are set to this
iot:item.schema:description: if a number or integer, the maximum value
iot:item.schema:name: maximum

iot:item.iot:help: typically values less are set to this
iot:item.schema:description: if a number or integer, the minimum value
iot:item.schema:name: minimum

iot:item.schema:description: A JavaScript function to validate this function
iot:item.schema:name: validator

iot:item.schema:description: the arithmetic precision of a value, i.e. valid digits past the decimal place
iot:item.schema:name: arithmetic-precision

iot:item.schema:description: if a string, this must be a color
iot:item.schema:name: format.color

iot:item.schema:description: if a string, this must be an ISO date
iot:item.schema:name: format.date

iot:item.schema:description: if a string, this must be an ISO datetime
iot:item.schema:name: format.datetime

iot:item.schema:description: if a string, it must be a valid IRI
iot:item.schema:name: format.iri

iot:item.schema:description: if a string, this must be an ISO time
iot:item.schema:name: format.time

iot:item.iot:help: if a string, this must be an ISO datetime
iot:item.schema:name: format.timedelta

iot:item.schema:description: relate something (typically an iot:Model) to an iot:attribute
iot:item.schema:name: attribute

iot:item.schema:description: see also, as an example or a place this is used
iot:item.schema:name: cf

iot:item.schema:description: what semantic purpose does Thing serve
iot:item.schema:name: facet

iot:item.schema:description: constrain strings to certain well-known fomats
iot:item.schema:name: format

iot:item.schema:description: bundle related stuff together, basically a JSON-LD hack
iot:item.schema:name: item

iot:item.schema:description: what semantic purpose does this iot:Attribute serve
iot:item.schema:name: purpose

iot:item.iot:help: use Wikipedia links if possible, e.g wikipedia:Ethanol
iot:item.schema:description: what is being sensed
iot:item.schema:name: sense

iot:item.schema:description: the valid JSON-like types for this value
iot:item.schema:name: type

iot:item.schema:description: the measurement-type units used
iot:item.schema:name: unit

iot:item.iot:help: Attributes with the same vector value should be considered part of a vector
iot:item.schema:description: Vector key
iot:item.schema:name: vector

iot:item.schema:description: what is being measured
iot:item.schema:name: what

iot:item.schema:description: valid values
iot:item.schema:name: enumeration

iot:item.schema:description: examples of how this may be used
iot:item.schema:name: examples

iot:item.schema:description: additional help for this item
iot:item.schema:name: help

iot:item.schema:description: a UUID for whatever this is
iot:item.schema:name: uuid

iot:item.schema:description: this may be a boolean
iot:item.schema:name: type.boolean

iot:item.schema:description: this may be an integer
iot:item.schema:name: type.integer

iot:item.schema:description: combine with other types as needed
iot:item.schema:name: type.list

iot:item.schema:description: this does not take a value / the value is ignored
iot:item.schema:name: type.null

iot:item.schema:description: this may be a number
iot:item.schema:name: type.number

iot:item.schema:description: combine with other types as needed
iot:item.schema:name: type.set

iot:item.iot:help: this can be further constrained by iot:format and iot:enumeration
iot:item.schema:description: this value may be a string
iot:item.schema:name: type.string
